Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/keywords/2053263713045852160/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Write a blog post for DK Plumbing"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/keywords/2053263713045852160/)_"
---
Act as an expert blog writer.

My Business, DK Plumbing, offers plumbing services, i can fix your hot water unit, Gas or electric, i can also repair leaking taps, broken showers, burst pipes hot and cold, I'm located in Wellington Point but service areas all around like Birkdale, Thornside, Ormiston, Alexander Hills and Cleveland.
Write a blog media post for my website www.dkplumbing.com.au about [PROMPT],




Make sure to use emojis and hashtags,

At the end have a call to action.

Also suggest a funny picture to capture the funny side of plumbing.

Example:

Have you ever needed a plumber in an emergency for your leaking hot water tank?

You need to understand that plumbing is important to maintaining good and clean water to drink and bath in.

Contact us now 0409 364 858.
[TARGETLANGUAGE]
PromptHint: Write a blog post for DK Plumbing
